title: CAPTAIN CANNONBALL - Life of a Soldier - Napoleon Total War Gameplay
description:
A legend was born a few days ago when a cannonball hit a Captain of a British regiment.  In today's video we are going to follow him around, and see if he survives the battle.  Will Captain Cannonball survive the battle?  Or will he die in a pool of blood.  Enjoy :D

Original Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=e42iLS77CVM


If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D
